name: 3DFPS (marquessbr)
description:
This is my 3D FPS Game from coursera.

I only created two levels because I work full time and it's a rush for me to take the course.

Even so, I created 3 sessions on the first level with a lot of tormentors and enemies, and I put a lot of weapons and health rewards to be harvested, I didn't make it much easier, but the game is quite playable.

On the second level, the boss level, I placed a room where there are plenty of rewards to be collected.

My computer runs on Linux, I don't know why, but I couldn't import the sounds in WebGL mode, so I ask you to ignore it, because it won't be possible to hear the sound when you're playing through the browser, unfortunately, it wasn't my problem and it's not I managed to resolve it in a timely manner.

I created a distribution for Linux.

That was all I got with what little time I had left.
